content.raw:
I don't think that we have the chance of run a shell script before the cleanup script is in place (for problems with pkgs/ permissions) or before SCM management is done (problems with .git/ permissions in other jobs).

The postBuildScript should run unconditionally and fixed the problem from the first failed run on. So hopefully, if you find this problem again, it should be fixed by re-running the first failed build and do not fail more.
